for _ in range(input()):
    n=input()
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    b=map(int,raw_input().split())
    t1=min(a)
    t2=max(b)
    c=[]
    for i in range(t1,t2+1,1):
        count=0
        for j in range(n):
            if(a[j]<=i<b[j]):
                count+=1
        c+=[count]
    print max(c)
